Barrage.help: You perform a quick punch that deals moderate damage. Coupled with other energy punches, Barrage can Disorient a foe. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Energy_Punch.help: You perform a powerful Energy Punch that deals moderate damage. When used with other Energy Melee attacks, Energy Punch can Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Bone_Smasher.help: A Bone Smasher attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a better chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Build_Up.help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You tap into your inner strength with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Whirling_Hands.help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Taunt.help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.victimHit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.victimHit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Total_Focus.help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Stun.help: By focusing your internal energy on your fists, you can turn them into personal tasers. This Stun attack deals minor damage, but has the best chance to Disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Energy_Transfer.help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Energy_Transfer.shortHelp: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -HP
